records.uncertainty_note: Specific location within Evros is redacted.
records.context_note: FSO RBI reported around 7:00 FX TM's Text Removed - Justification 2,3 informed about hearable gunshots Text Removed - Justification 5. The sound also was heard by Hellenic Police Officers who passed the info to Text Removed - Justification 3. The shots were far away from TM's position and no visual contact with shooters was possible. Nobody was injured. Hellenic Police and military monitoring constantly the area.

Today after Frontex charter flight arrival from Sofia with the new TMs deployed in frame of RBI 2020 Evros, during handing over the weapons from airport staff to FX TMs, one gun Text Removed - Justification 2 was missed. Airport personnel checked once again a baggage compartment in the plane and Text Removed - Justification 2 baggage was x-rayed as well. The weapon has been handed over to the prosecutor as part of a standard procedure. It appears that the weapon fell off the luggage belt in Sofia Airport, without having been noticed. The weapon most probably will be returned to the Police of Sofia Airport next week. Finally the weapon was found at Sofia Airport. The company confirmed delivery the weapon to the owner. The case is over.
records.evidence_quote: one gun Text Removed - Justification 2 was missed

records.uncertainty_note: Specific location within Evros is redacted, but nearby villages Marasia and Kastanies are mentioned.
records.context_note: On 21.05.2020, Text Removed - Justification 2 team deployed in a frame of FOA Land Text Removed Justification 4 and Text Removed - Justification 2 team deployed in a frame of RBI Evros while patrolling in the vicinity of Text Removed - Justification 4, reported that they heard a few possible gunfire shots, coming from Marasia (border village to the north of Kastanies). None of the TMs saw who did it. It was not possible to localize the cases of the shootings by hearing due to the wind. Timeline of the shooting is as follows: At 22:24 12 shots were heard (later local GRC patrol deployed to the north, Text Removed - Justification 5, reported that the shots were coming from a TUR patrol in the area); At 22:32 3 shots were heard (later local GRC patrol deployed to the north, Text Removed - Justification 5, reported that the shots were coming from a TUR patrol in the area); On 22.05.2020, at 02.25 15 shots were heard (those shots were not reported by local GRC patrols and it was not possible to estimate their origin or location due to the wind). Hellenic Police monitoring the area. FX TMs support HP and follow safety measures recommendations.
records.evidence_quote: heard a few possible gunfire shots, coming from Marasia (border village to the north of Kastanies)

records.uncertainty_note: Specific location within Evros is redacted, origin of shots is described as 'from the Turkish side'.
records.context_note: 13.05.2020 Text Removed Justification 2, 3 informed about 4 (four) shots heard on 12.05.2020 at 23:30 from the Turkish side. No Turkish Land Forces were observed nor other persons. According to Greek authority it is hardly to assess where the shots were fired from. The Text Removed - Justification 2 Team was not directly affected - just heard the shots sound. No more information as regards to the incident will provided by Greek authority. GRC provides with constant monitoring via patrolling. FX TMs keep safety measures recommended.
records.evidence_quote: 4 (four) shots heard on 12.05.2020 at 23:30 from the Turkish side.

records.context_note: 12.05.2020 at 16:50 the information came from Text Removed Justification 3 regarding Text Removed - Justification 2 deployed under RBI 2020 Evros who was transported by Text Removed - Justification 2 to Alexandroupolis hospital, having sevre bellyache. Similar symptoms Text Removed - Justification 2 had have last Sunday and after the doctor visit he had got paracetamol and come to the hotel. This time after an initial examination it was diagnosed like appendicitis. However due to the fact Text Removed - Justification 2 had 37,8 fever so they treated him as possible COVID case. He will stay in the hospital this night for detailed medical checks. Tomorrow the test result for COVID will come out. After a visit to Alexandroupolis' Hospital on 21.05.2020 the doctor's recommendation are to continue recovery at the hotel. Surgery is very likely if the appendicitis is confirmed. His life is not in danger. Text Removed - Justification 2 is supposed to fully recover and be ready to resume operational activity in the end of Mayl/beginning of June.
records.evidence_quote: Text Removed - Justification 2 in hospital with bellyache
